Room.Name: Ministry Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Ministry Way, east of the Snake Eyes Gambling Hall.
Room.LongDescription: The Snake Eyes Gambling Facility is one of the rowdiest bars in Oceancrest, short of the Fiesty Kitten. On the east side of the road is the Gnomen Temple of Garl Glittergold. The gnomen diety is one of the most powerful gods in gnomen mythology.
